about_the_game:
Welcome to Beak Island, a tiny haven breaking its 50-years silence to greet visitors! But wait, the island's not quite ready yet. That's where you come in! We need you to take charge of the island's visitor center. Your mission? Whip up meals for the visitors and develop the island's tourism resources. Easy peasy, right? Support? Well... there isn't any. But don't worry! Try asking the island's residents for a helping hand. Good luck!

Features

  • Explore the island: The provincial park office has given you 100% autonomy. No joke!

  • Chat with the locals: Listen to their stories. You might find ways to help each other out.

  • Discover recipes: Research local ingredients to create culinary masterpieces. Pineapple on pizza, you say? Hmm... is that even legal?

  • Spruce up the island: Repair old facilities to give the island a makeover. Personally, I'm a fan of telescopes in observation decks.

  • Reap the rewards: All profits from selling food to visitors are yours to keep. What's on your wish list? A fancy boat?

  • Attract more visitors: Delight visitors to attract more. Who knows? Some might even decide to make Beak Island their new home!

short_description: Congrats! You're now in charge of Beak Island's visitor center. This old gem's a bit rusty, and help's scarce, but don't let that stop you! Spruce up the island, cook up some treats, and bring back the buzz from 50 years ago. It's all in your hands now!
